text: Blenio is a municipality in the district of Blenio in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. It was created on 22 October 2006 when the former municipalities of Aquila, Campo (Blenio), Ghirone, Olivone and Torre merged to form the new municipality of Blenio. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Blenio Category:2006 establishments in Switzerland
title: Blenio
